name: Bangin' Banana Bread
author: dad_can_cook
summary: Moist, fluffy and flavorful banana bread with macadamia nuts.
ingredients: ½ cup butter, at room temperature
½ cup coarsely chopped macadamia nuts
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a mixing bowl, beat the butter and sugar together with an electric mixer until thoroughly blended
Beat in the eggs, one at a time, and add the bananas, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and vanilla extract
Stir in the flour by hand until barely combined, and gently fold the macadamia nuts into the batter
Pour the batter into the prepared pan, and bake on the oven's middle shelf until a toothpick or cake tester inserted in the middle of the loaf comes out clean, 60 to 65 minutes
Remove from oven, and let the loaf rest for 10 minutes before turning out from the pan
